Candy is the food that brings happiness.
And here is the world of candy!
For the teeth that were eaten by sugar in those years, I respect you ~ don't complain when you leave (

Game introduction:

The life of sugar is amazing. First, carefully select all kinds of high-quality ingredients, then melt, boil, cool and reconcile, shape, select and package.
